title: Small meet up and 2 v 2 competition in Brisbane
body:
Hey everyone,

I'm going to be in Brisbane this weekend and had a free Friday night. Thought it would be cool to meet some local players and host a fun mini event!

You can check out the full details here
https://www.facebook.com/events/1104577766301921/

come to G castle hang out, play some games and talk League. I'll also be hosting a fun 2 v 2 competition on the night which you can sign up for if you are coming along!

replies.body:
Wow thats a great idea Marauder!

Unfortunately I'm from across the ditch so i wont be able to come. But its awesome to see Rioters and the community doing things like this! :)
